about_the_game:
Entity: Midnight’s Watcher is a spine-chilling FPS horror game that follows Alex, who revisits his old farmhouse after a long time, only to discover that something evil has taken hold of the land. Each night, Alex faces strange and terrifying encounters, reminiscent of Slender Man — but as the days pass, the horror becomes increasingly personal.

The Story

Every night, Alex witnesses horrific scenes: people being stalked, attacked, and taken by a dark figure — the Entity known as the Watcher. The once peaceful farmhouse is now a deadly battleground, where the Watcher hunts its victims, and Alex may be its next target. As the final night approaches, Alex’s hunt for survival turns into a race against time, as he confronts the entity in a deadly showdown.

Every choice you make impacts your survival. The Entity is always watching, waiting for you to slip up, and its influence grows stronger with each passing hour. Will you survive the night, or will you become the next victim in the dark grasp of the Watcher?

Key Features:

  • 7 Nights of Terror: Uncover a story that unfolds across seven horrifying nights, each more terrifying than the last.

  • Unforgettable Encounters: Experience nightmarish encounters with the Watcher, whose presence grows stronger each night, as you witness others falling victim to its power.

  • A Personal Nightmare: Join Alex on his journey to uncover the terrifying truth behind the Watcher’s curse and his connection to the sinister events unfolding at his family’s farmhouse.

  • Dynamic Entity Threats: Slender Man-like figures and other terrifying creatures stalk the night, keeping you on edge as you attempt to survive.

  • Intricate Puzzles and Exploration: Solve puzzles and explore the farmhouse and surrounding areas to uncover the dark secrets hidden within.

  • Immersive Atmosphere: A tense and immersive first-person experience filled with disturbing sounds, eerie visuals, and creeping shadows.

  • Strategic Survival: Conserve limited resources, avoid deadly encounters, and plan your every move to outwit the growing threats.

  • Final Hunt: As the nights draw to a close, Alex faces the ultimate test of survival — can he confront the Entity and escape, or will he be claimed by its terrifying grasp?

Every night brings Alex closer to the truth, but also closer to the deadly hunt that will determine his fate.
